ats:Lavender.NAME: 综合园艺成果
ats:Lavender.FLAVOR: 调香师的植物园闻起来总有淡淡的薰衣草味。
DESCRIPTIONS: 在回合结束时,回复 #b
点生命。

ats:Spiritual Recovery.NAME: 精神回复
ats:Spiritual Recovery.FLAVOR: 它含有少量芥末提取物。。。
DESCRIPTIONS: 每当回复生命时获得 #b
#y技力 。

ats:Rhine Circuitry.NAME: Originium Zone Generator
ats:Rhine Circuitry.FLAVOR: Originium crystals are planted in advance to ensure that the Caster team can complete their mission. This form of combat...
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card, apply #b
#yBurn to ALL enemies.

ats:Military Tradition.NAME: Transporter-Type Meebo
ats:Military Tradition.FLAVOR: The “Great Meebo Monument” is covered with the codenames of its compatriots, but it knows no joy or sorrow. It simply wants to work.
DESCRIPTIONS: 在战斗开始时,获得 #b
#y技力 。

ats:Ability Aura.NAME: Braintet
ats:Ability Aura.FLAVOR: A new type of energy draught developed by Parasol Pharmaceuticals. It’s sugar free, has a minty taste, and has no side effects.
DESCRIPTIONS: 在回合开始时, 获得 #b
#y技力 。

ats:Sanity.NAME: 理智
DESCRIPTIONS: 回合内每当你第一次消费 #y技力 时返还一半的 #y技力 ，获得等同返还值的 #y格挡 。 (最多 #b5)

ats:Sanity Plus.NAME: 理智+
DESCRIPTIONS: #r取代 #r理智。 回合内每当你第一次消费 #y技力 时返还一半的 #y技力 ，获得等同返还值的 #y格挡 。 NL #y最大技力值 增加 #b10。

ats:Berate.NAME: Captain Morgan’s Wine
ats:Berate.FLAVOR: A wine produced in the Iberian region. Despite having gained popularity in the heart of Victoria’s bustling cities, it is now discontinued.
DESCRIPTIONS: 每当你打出攻击牌,获得 #b
#y技力 。

ats:Industrial Water Cannon.NAME: Superelastic Alloy Spring
ats:Industrial Water Cannon.FLAVOR: High-quality springs with several times the elasticity of normal springs. Regardless of how you use them, be careful not to hurt yourself.
DESCRIPTIONS: 每当你消费 #y技力 , 抽1张牌。

ats:Bonebreaker.NAME: Corroded Silver Lance
ats:Bonebreaker.FLAVOR: A lance that can pierce mountains and lakes, accompanied by the trampling of hooves that can disperse gathered clouds. Fireworks and advertisements have dulled everyone’s memories, but they are still out there.
DESCRIPTIONS: 每次攻击都会造成最少 #b
点伤害。

ats:Arts.NAME: Sabotage Co-op Expansion
ats:Arts.FLAVOR: It is difficult to gain the upper hand in frontline combat with only a single squad of Operators. Supplementing combat capabilities through Co-ops is an effective solution.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose and add #b3 #yCaster cards to your deck.
Caster Card

ats:Assault.FLAVOR: It is difficult to gain the upper hand in frontline combat with only a single squad of Operators. Supplementing combat capabilities through Co-ops is an effective solution.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose and add #b3 #yVanguard cards to your deck.

DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose and add #b3 #yDefender cards to your deck.

Supporter Card

ats:Hidden Killer.NAME: 隐匿的杀手
ats:Hidden Killer.FLAVOR: 为什么不把你的手伸向她?
DESCRIPTIONS: 如果你在回合中不打出任何 #y攻击牌 , 下个回合获得 #b2 点力量。

ats:Gyao.NAME: "Roar" Pendant
ats:Gyao.FLAVOR: An amulet circulated among a few members of the L.G.D. who don’t take their work very seriously. Said to be able to double one’s bonuses.
DESCRIPTIONS: 每当你得到金币时额外获得 #b15 金币。

ats:Originium.NAME: 至纯源石
ats:Originium.FLAVOR: 据说克洛丝正在寻找这些东西。
DESCRIPTIONS: #y最大SP值 提高 #b10。

ats:Tactical Delivery.NAME: Crate of Explosive Building Materials
ats:Tactical Delivery.FLAVOR: Rhodes Island’s portable basic building materials kits are limited in quantity. If lost, please reapply for redistribution. Please assemble according to the instructions.
DESCRIPTIONS: 在你的回合开始时获得 [E] 。 #y最大技力值 减少 #b20

ats:Emergency Defibrillator.NAME: 紧急除颤
ats:Emergency Defibrillator.FLAVOR: 在除颤器运行期间,请不要采取暴力行为。
DESCRIPTIONS: 每当受到的攻击伤害会令你的生命值降低至 #b25%, 此次攻击伤害变为0并且在下个回合开始时回复 #b50% 生命。（只生效1次）
攻击伤害降低至0。 在下个回合开始时回复 #b50% 生命。

ats:Remnant Ash.NAME: 余烬
DESCRIPTIONS: 当你受到致命伤害时，你的生命不会降至1以下，但2回合后死亡（只生效1次）
你的生命不会降至1以下。 你将在 #b
个回合后死亡。

ats:Omniscience.NAME: “Self-Defense Handbook”
ats:Omniscience.FLAVOR: Its complete title is, “Handbook of Self-Defense When Traveling to the City-States of Other Countries Surrounding Laterano and the Zones Between Them.” You can read it, but you can’t learn anything from it.
DESCRIPTIONS: 在每场战斗开始时获得25%额外生命值。

ats:Hearts K.NAME: 红桃K
DESCRIPTIONS: 在每场战斗开始时, 降低所有敌人 #b4 点 #y力量 #b1 回合。

ats:Hearts K Plus.NAME: 红桃K+
ats:Hearts K Plus.FLAVOR: "只要全部干掉就完事了吧？别想那么简单？那真麻烦啊......"
DESCRIPTIONS: 在每场战斗开始时, #y击晕 所有敌人.
